title: Hadran
enDesc: The Hadran is recited at the completion of a seder of Mishnah or a tractate of Talmud. The text of the prayer gives thanks to God for allowing the reciter to learn the seder or masechet and expresses the desire to return to the text for continued study in the future. The author of the Hadran text is anonymous.
enShortDesc: Text recited upon completion of study of a section of Mishnah or Talmud.
heShortDesc: קטע הנאמר לאחר סיום לימוד מסכת מן המשנה או מן התלמוד.
